title: how to improve kerning and letterspacing in font lab
content:
I have designed glyphs (letters and digits) for two script fonts in Font Lab. I’m looking for advice in optimizing the letterspacing and kerning for both. They are SpencerianScript and Chancery Italic Calligraphic fonts.
